headline: Mixed Analyst Sentiment on GE Vernova (GEV) Amid Oversupply Concerns and PJM Emergency Auction Proposal
summary: GE Vernova Inc. (NYSE:GEV) is one of the best AI energy stocks to buy now. On January 16, 2026, GE Vernova Inc. (NYSE:GEV) was cited as the clearest winner by Jefferies. headline: Unlocking Q4 Potential of GE Vernova (GEV): Exploring Wall Street Estimates for Key Metrics
summary: Besides Wall Street's top-and-bottom-line estimates for GE Vernova (GEV), review projections for some of its key metrics to gain a deeper understanding of how the company might have fared during the quarter ended December 2025.

headline: General Electric Company: The Growth Runway Looks Longer Than The Market Thinks
summary: General Electric delivered double-digit revenue and EPS growth in 2023, with Q4 revenue up 20% and orders up 74%, supporting a positive long-term outlook. Learn more on GE stock here.

headline: Meta Earnings, Fed Decision, Venezuela Testimony: What to Watch This Week
summary: Earnings season is in full throttle, with results expected from big-name companies including UnitedHealth, Chevron and Boeing. A quartet of tech giants—Apple, Meta Platforms, Microsoft and Tesla—will also report results.
